titles.title: Congratulating East New York Transit Technical High School of Brooklyn, New York, on winning the 2006-2007 PSAL New York City Boys Basketball Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 3/27/2007--Introduced. Congratulates the East New York Transit Technical High School boys basketball team on winning the 2006-2007 PSAL New York City Boys Basketball Championship.
